## NODE\_CURSOR\_DEFAULTS variable

A list of nodes that need special treatment for composition events on android and also for arrow key presses between items in general. Used by both the CompositionExtension and NodeCursorExtension

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NODE_CURSOR_DEFAULTS: string[]
```
